divs: sighting details1-30-11 7:48 pm garner, nc quick video of triangle object.. all, this appeared very quickly and i only have around 2\5 seconds of it, please pause it and slow it down and look at the object. you make the decision on what it is. i apologize for not a cleaner picture\video. it was flying real fast and it was straight above my home and could not get a good shot of it. stop it at 7 thru 10 to really look at the ship.
